card_text: (This card is always treated as a "Fire Formation" card.)$NEach time a "Fire Fist" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 1 Fire Fist Counter on this card. Once per turn: You can remove Fire Fist Counters from your field to activate 1 of these effects;$N●2: If your Beast-Warrior monster attacks this turn, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step.$N●6: Add 1 Beast-Warrior monster from your Deck to your hand.$N●10: Special Summon 1 Beast-Warrior monster from your Deck or Extra Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions.
